name: Kingston Kenya Adventures - Alpha Demo
description:
New Game from Witty Inventions Now! (Still Early & Work in Progress...)

Play as the brother sister duo of Kingston and Kenya!

Play as either individually or both together in Co-op mode!

Controls - Single Player Game:

  • P1 Arrow Keys Move and Space Jumps

Controls - 2 Player Game:

  • P1 Arrow Keys Move and Space Jumps
  • P2 A,D Keys Move and F Key Jumps
